admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project consists of the
            following: (a) construction, supply and installation of a
            new oil-fired thermal power station a of 2 x 120 MW located
            at Pasir Gudang; and (b) supply and installation of
            transmission facilities.
